name: UILayoutGuide
desc: A rectangular area that can interact with Auto Layout.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: A string used to identify the layout guide.

items.name: var layoutFrame: CGRect
items.desc: The layout guide’s frame in its owning view’s coordinate system.

items.name: var owningView: UIView?
items.desc: The view that owns this layout guide.

items.name: var bottomAnchor: NSLayoutYAxisAnchor
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the bottom edge of the layout guide’s frame.

items.name: var centerXAnchor: NSLayoutXAxisAnchor
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the horizontal center of the layout guide’s frame.

items.name: var centerYAnchor: NSLayoutYAxisAnchor
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the vertical center of the layout guide’s frame.

items.name: var heightAnchor: NSLayoutDimension
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the height of the layout guide’s frame.

items.name: var leadingAnchor: NSLayoutXAxisAnchor
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the leading edge of the layout guide’s frame.

items.name: var leftAnchor: NSLayoutXAxisAnchor
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the left edge of the layout guide’s frame.

items.name: var rightAnchor: NSLayoutXAxisAnchor
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the right edge of the layout guide’s frame.

items.name: var topAnchor: NSLayoutYAxisAnchor
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the top edge of the layout guide’s frame.

items.name: var trailingAnchor: NSLayoutXAxisAnchor
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the trailing edge of the layout guide’s frame.

items.name: var widthAnchor: NSLayoutDimension
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the width of the layout guide’s frame.

items.name: func constraintsAffectingLayout(for: NSLayoutConstraint.Axis) -> [NSLayoutConstraint]
items.desc: The constraints that impact the layout of the guide.

items.name: var hasAmbiguousLayout: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the constraints impacting the layout guide specify its location ambiguously.

items.name: var keyboardLayoutGuide: UIKeyboardLayoutGuide
items.desc: A layout guide that tracks the keyboard’s position in your app’s layout.

items.name: class UIKeyboardLayoutGuide
items.desc: A layout guide that represents the space the keyboard occupies in your app’s layout.

items.name: class UITrackingLayoutGuide
items.desc: A layout guide that automatically activates and deactivates layout constraints depending on its proximity to edges.
